uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

is_config_file_update_enabled.description: Enable DHCP option 66 and 67 processing for configuration file updates

is_host_name_option_enabled.description: Enable DHCP option 12 to include the device hostname

is_image_file_update_enabled.description: Enable vendor-specific option processing for image file updates

is_tr69_acs_url_enabled.description: Enable to receive the ACS URL via DHCP
